line_1: And in His Book of Life the Inmates poor enroll.
line_2: The pompous strain, the sacredotal stole;

line_1: And in His Book of Life the Inmates poor enroll.
line_2: May hear, well pleas'd, the language of the Soul;

line_1: And proudly bid immortal fame enrol
line_2: Led willing captive to their high control:
